2014-04-11 Fixed README.rst and added keywords to setup.py.
           New release is 0.3.2.

2014-04-10 Documentation improvements. Added `string_fasta_parser`
           and the presumably less-used `io_fasta_parser`.
           Added the making of epydoc to the Makefile.
           New release is 0.3.1.

2014-04-09 Initial release, version 0.2.1.
